header.title: IE6 No More (Upgrade from v1.0.2 to v1.0.3)
header.description: Displays the IE6 No More banner on your forum's index page, to encourage users of Internet Explorer 6 to upgrade to a modern browser. This banner is visible only to IE6 users.
header.author-notes: From http://www.ie6nomore.com, a group of people who want to see IE 6 disappear as soon as possible. To help make that happen, they're encouraging IE 6 users to upgrade to a more modern browser, so they can have a better experience using sites and browsing the web.

changelog.change: Fixed spelling errors in Spanish language file.
Added support for several languages (English, Spanish, French, Dutch, Italian, Swedish, Portuguese, Japanese).
Added Opera to the list of browser choices.
All graphics are now included in this mod so it's no longer dependent on downloading anything from the ie6nomore.com site.
Optimized code to follow rules for strict XHTML.

action-group.diy-instructions: If you are using the Spanish language version, replace language/es/mods/ie6_no_more.php Slovak language file added to this installer package in language/sk/mods/ie6_no_more.php.
